website_summaries.verdict: Offers an exciting combination of lightweight coverage and 30 SPF that makes it perfect for warm weather and consumers who prefer a sheer foundation over thick, matte formulas.
pros: An Allure magazine award-winning tinted moisturizer and foundation in one that goes on smoothly for sheer to medium coverage and provides 30 SPF
Made with plant-based ingredients and electrolytes for superior moisture – perfect for dry skin
Feels lightweight on the skin, and absorbs fast
cons: Doesn't wear as long as some other options from bareMinerals
Some users gripe about it emphasizing imperfections like lines and pores
Some shades look different on the skin than in the tube

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I'm 67 and have used many of Bare Minerals products over the last 10 years or so, starting with the Original Matte powder foundation. I decided to try this as an alternative and am pleasantly surprised at how much I like it. It goes on smoothly, you can build coverage as desired, and it looks natural and stays on all day. I had thought it'd just be a tinted moisturizer, but it's actually the best liquid foundation I've tried in a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Debbi Feiner

customer_reviews.title: So shiny...make it stop
customer_reviews.text: I put this on 5 hours ago and set it with Bare Minerals original powder foundation and I look like I’ve rubbed oil all over my face and my pores look huge. The color is fine, it works well as a sunscreen, but all this shine doesn’t look great on mature skin. I need to wash it off, it looks awful.
customer_reviews.author: Renaissance Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! the best make up out there, its very lightweight you can not even tell you are wearing makeup, and it looks great, blends perfectly without streaking and looks very natural, you don't have to wear that much which is even better! and you can't beat the price! its a win all around!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey!

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever write reviews but felt that I should for this product. My face is so sensitive to breaking out that I barely wear concealer, foundation, or any face make up in general. This has done wonders for me, fills in lines & pores and evens skin tone amazingly. On top of working magic it doesn’t even look like you are wearing any makeup which is the best thing of all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: too orange
customer_reviews.text: Too orange! It is neutral 05. My skin tone is mildly olive. I am Caucasian, german/irish with freckles, dark brown hair and light brown eyes. I usually choose creamy natural in cover girl. Since I am older I want something that does not sink into my wrinkles. It does the job nicely in that area, but it is orangey. I think I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: P S Buch

customer_reviews.title: Finally a face make up that doesn't make all my ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally a face make up that doesn't make all my wrinkles show even more. Very sheer which is exactly what I wanted. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: K. McClure

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff for Natural Look
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this stuff for a while. Blends easily, moisturizes nicely, and soaks in well after you give it a little bit of time. It's good for a nice, natural, transparent coverage level. But if you add more layers, you'll get more coverage. I love thee stuff and swear by it. I often get too tired to wash my face and ever since I've used this, I never break out when I leave it on overnight every so often (like I used to with other products).
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation for my skin.......
customer_reviews.text: I've used this foundation for about 3 years and it's my all-time favorite for this 60 year old. It's light, a perfect match for my skin tone and stays put. You can layer it for more coverage, if you like or use a concealer underneath for more coverage. It looks great on and wears well all day for me and never looks cakey. I initially went to Sephora and they helped in choosing the right shade for my skin, which is often the biggest challenge of buying foundation. This is perfect for me, in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Donna D.

customer_reviews.title: Emptyish container and cream adds glow/shine
customer_reviews.text: There’s not very much liquid actually in this container. My box wasn’t sealed and maybe it was a tester cause I was surprised at how much free space was inside the container. As for the cream, I have fair-olive skin (it’s the middle of winter so I’m pale) and the natural tone didn’t really make a difference in my skin color which I guess is good. It does however have a bit of a shine/glow to it which I don’t like.
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Light, but covers just enough!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited about this stuff! I have sensitive skin and rosacea; I have had the hardest time finding anything to even out my redness without looking cake-y or generally weird. Then, if I found something that kind of worked, I could never find the right color (I am somewhere between "ivory" and "beige"). This is absolutely perfect! The finish is a little dewy for my liking, but a light dusting of powder & it's just right! I don't feel like I'm wearing any makeup at all & my skin looks great. I am beyond delighted!
customer_reviews.author: Scootersaurus

customer_reviews.title: I’m so impressed with this product. Light weight and offer a natural coverage
customer_reviews.text: I’m absolutely impressed with this product. I was seeking an alternatives to the moisturizers I had used before and can me across this one. I decided to try it and I was blown away. I always felt like I couldn’t leave the house without make Up. With this product I decided to stop using make up all together!!!!. Although it doesn’t offer the same type of coverage As foundation, it evens out the imperfections of complexion and blemishes and it gives a glow and offers a ultra natural look. It was definitely a game changer for me!!!!. Highly recommend that you try it!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Aranda

customer_reviews.title: No Filter
customer_reviews.text: This product is as it is described. Very light weight and moisturizing. It has good enough coverage for this first time mom not to have to worry about dark circles from lack of sleep. I also struggle with acne and this has helped with that. I don't always have the time or energy to wash my face and this doesn't clog my pores. I would recommend this to anyone! My only con is the color descriptions, they could use more details.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing - Oily and thin.
customer_reviews.text: After reading all of the great reviews, I thought I would try this product. Unfortunately, I won't be making a second purchase. The coverage and color are fine, but this product is very thin, oily and the application is way too shiny. Does not seem like a very high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: BOYCOTTAMAZON

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for price
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is wow. This is the best tinted moisturizer ever. It feels sooo buttery smooth when you're putting it on and it's very moisturizing and leaves you with a summery glow. It isn't full coverage, but does cover up blemishes nicely. I previously used the IT cosmetics CC cream, but i found it difficult to blend because it is so thick/full coverage. I like this so much more!! Plus such a great price for it's value.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Dermody

customer_reviews.title: The Best Liquid Makeup Ever!
customer_reviews.text: The best liquid makeup ever! I’ve been a Bare Minerals user for a long time - I’m guessing 20 years. I’m 60+ years old, have very sensitive skin and like to achieve a lighter, natural look with makeup but do need some coverage. I suffer from Rosacea so must use a non-comedogenic foundation and blush. BareMinerals Complexion Rescue does works perfectly! My skin tends to be on the dry side, so I do use a moisturizer first but anyone with normal skin might not have to. I highly recommend you try this product!
customer_reviews.author: Chaneilus

customer_reviews.title: This is all I wear!
customer_reviews.text: I actually just use this as my foundation. It’s light and moisturizing, and very natural looking while still smoothing out my skin and evening my complexion. I think it looks great, and I get frequent compliments on my skin. When I was younger and more break-out prone, I definitely could not have pulled this off. Nowadays my skin runs a bit dry, so this is perfect (So consider your own complexion and maybe test in store first!) My husband and I both dislike a heavily made-up look, so this is just nice. The natural color works for me year-round! Lovely product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan & Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a moisturized that I could use as a foundation as well (since I really don't want to have to use both - that's too much for my skin to handle), and this one is it! It is "heavy" (I can't think of another word right now) enough to cover my flaws and boo-boos, but still light enough to be comfortable. I apply it after my moisturizer and a setting gel, and use a flat brush. I love the way it goes on, the way it covers/fills in, and how it lasts all day. Great coverage!
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Have used this for the past couple of years and love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a couple of years. Lightweight, but with enough coverage it hides imperfections in my skin. SPF 30. When I originally began using this, it was recommended by Bare Minerals to use it over Bare Minerals Under/Over Finishing Powder, which has been discontinued. However, I now use it over a small amount of Bella Pierre mineral foundation powder, which seems closer to the Bare Minerals Under/Over, and helps keep it from settling into the fine lines around my mouth. Either way (with or without the finishing powder), this foundation works better for me than any other brands I have tried, which have been numerous.
customer_reviews.author: L D.

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SHINY!!
customer_reviews.text: Too shiny! Great coverage and color but my face looks like an oil slick. Returning because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaging issue.
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to be fine but not happy about packaging..I think a box would have been better especially if I planned to give it as a gift. This happened before but I failed to act quickly about the packaging on another product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oh man!
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice and moisturizing! It feels like a tinted moisturizer which was exactly what I was looking for! I will definitely continue to use this! And I have very oily skin, this does not make me more oily. So yay!
customer_reviews.author: Austyn

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: Let’s start by, I am very picky when it comes to Moisturizer and coverage! I’ve used this product a few days now and absolutely LOVE it, it gives my skin the fresh glow I was looking for, all while feeling like my skin is receiving, the nourishment I was lacking. I’m obsessed and can’t wait to try more of Bare minerals products! It is very lightweight with buildable coverage and dose not make me break out or feel greasy!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Colovich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in-between
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is the perfect midway between a tinted moisturizer and a foundation. I can't even remember the last time I wore foundation since discovering this a few years ago. Other similar products will break me out or are too lightweight to make a difference. I don't usually even wear other Bare Minerals products but this one is a MUST HAVE.
customer_reviews.author: Nate's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice tinted moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I like to wear tinted moisturizers in the summer & this is my favorite one to wear. It evens out my skin tone without that makeup look. My face looks and feels hydrated but not greasy. It's my go to product for the summer. I would like to see it have a higher SPF than 30.
customer_reviews.author: aqua2711

customer_reviews.title: I love this foundation
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation. At 47, it's hard for me to find a foundation that doesn't go on too heavy or too thin. I loved the "natural" tint which goes well with my fair skin. The price was great and the shipping very fast.
customer_reviews.author: DEEJ

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a tinted sunscreen moisturizer that works for me
customer_reviews.text: I am between fair to medium cool tone and the neutral was perfect for me. I have tried all the high end tinted natural sunscreen moisturizers (allergic to the chemical sunscreens so have to do the natural ones) and this is the first one that wasn't heavy, matched my skin tone perfectly, and felt like it was moisturizing. Excellent product!!! Didn't break out my face like the other high end ones either.
customer_reviews.author: 123sAnonymous

customer_reviews.title: great option for light weight coverage
customer_reviews.text: a really nice product that provides nice coverage without looking like you're wearing a bunch of makeup. I do need to ensure my moisturizer dries a bit before I apply or it can remain wet for a while (in those cases it comes off on my mask), but as long as I give it a few seconds to soak in, the makeup goes on smoothly and looks great. I use a foundation wet brush for application.
customer_reviews.author: KateLyns

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and durable
customer_reviews.text: I have fair skin and I have allergies that cause my skin to redden at times, this covers it without feeling caked, I had never wore makeup before and was really hesitant, I dont have much to compare against but it does make a difference on my skin's appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best foundation I've ever worn!
customer_reviews.text: This foundation is moisturizing and non-caking. I've received so many compliments on my skin since I started using this about 2 years ago! I am 57 yrs old, and my skin has never looked better!
customer_reviews.author: H. C. Keith

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other reviewers...doesn’t do much for coverage AND there’s no SPF so wats the point? I used it in place of foundation in Hawaii as I didn’t want heavy coverage or weight but it didn’t cover st all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It’s good it has a tendency to be orangey. I like it because i have very dry skin and sensitive skin but sometimes i feel like it makes it worse.
customer_reviews.author: Cubbbdawg

customer_reviews.title: More like a foundation. Not a tinted moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: There’s nothing “gel” about this. I’ve been on the hunt for a true “tinted moisturizer” since they discontinued Rimmel insta flawless. This isn’t a terrible product. It’s just closer to a foundation than a tinted moisturizer. The color is nice. I will still use it. But still on the hunt for a true tinted moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great for combination skin type
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product and have bought it over and over again! I have combination skin type and this product does not break me out. It gives me a healthy glow with some light coverage. I don’t wear heavy makeups, so I just dab a small account and it generally last me a whole day. However, if you want full coverage, I suggest you go with some concealer or go with your normal makeup routine ie foundation, etc. And if you plan to stay outdoor for a long time, please wear sunscreen with SPF 50+.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Produces a Lovely light finish with little use of Product
customer_reviews.text: I adore this. I use almost nothing, it spreads evenly, and the end product is wonderful looking on my skin. I wish I had found it sooner. I am replacing the Bare Minerals powder which was starting to make my skin look older. This produces a dewier finer appearance.
customer_reviews.author: M Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed, sheer/light feeling yet good coverage
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using BareMinerals for years now. I use the loose powders and the BarePro concealer stick. I’ve never used a liquid makeup before trying this. It works great! Nice and sheer but it does a great job covering dark circles and beginnings of age spots. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SAS

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Face felt like it had a mask on it. Very oily after awhile too.
customer_reviews.author: shkspr wrote me

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: So I have oily skin and switched away from liquid foundation. I've been using the bare minerals powder foundation for a light coverage option. My mother in law recommend a tinted moisturizer for morning use and of course I tried the bare minerals tinted moisturizer and wow I absolutely love it! When I first used it I applied with my fingers like I would any moisturizer, and I wasn't in love with the look. But I have it another chance and applied it with a foundation brush and that absolutely did the trick. My skin isn't too shiny and it's just enough tint to even my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: larissa

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not full coverage.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect this to have the same coverage as makeup and it doesn’t. But for around the house or a quick trip to the store it’s ok. Feels good on my skin. I’m probably going to shop for a cheaper brand at Target for this purpose but I have no complaints for this product other than it’s more than i want to spend. .
customer_reviews.author: Messy Miracles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. A little goes a long way and does a beautiful job of evening your complexion. You look improved, not made up. Very lightweight and makes my skin feel wonderful and moisturized. The sun protection is an added bonus. My new favorite beauty product.
customer_reviews.author: M MCELROY

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product as my foundation. It applies easily and feels light on my skin. And best of all, it’s relatively inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kay H

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I have completely clear skin after using this just 3 days! So glad I found it. Cutting silicones out of my skincare including spf was difficult (they are in so many products) but has made a huge improvement, no more clogged pores!
customer_reviews.author: quietbubble

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tinted moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This tinted moisturizer is WONDERFUL. There are days that I actually feel comfortable wearing it alone. But, when I where it under my BareMinerals powder foundation... it acts like a light concealer. I recommend applying it with a brush, as they recommend. LOVE this product.
customer_reviews.author: dtopp

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel makes you want to wear it.
customer_reviews.text: I still like this moisturizing tinted cream. I use it every day. I actually don’t like it so much during the humid months but still can feel a difference in the less tightness in my face if I don’t mind a little shine.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Double

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to daily all over face coverup. Light, feels good on my skin, and gives me a little bit of that dewy look. Covers up uneven skin tone and blemishes and doesn’t cause breakouts. Worth the little extra $!
customer_reviews.author: Emily C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for casual coverage.
customer_reviews.text: The product goes on light and smooth. It does not offer full coverage so I use a concealer or powder on areas where I need more coverage. It matches well with my skin tone and blocks the sun well.
customer_reviews.author: hear it live

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I usually get Laura Mercier Tinted Moisturizer. I like this product better. Goes on very smooth & silky. It gives you a flawless radiant look. One of my friends even commented on it. She asked me what I had on my skin because my face looked so flawless. I will be buying more of this product. I bought natural and it should work for most people. If you are super fair I would go one shade lighter. Great product. : )
customer_reviews.author: Mary in the West

customer_reviews.title: Different than used to
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, but the coverage is just different than what I am used to. I am going to continue to use it, because I still like the coverage, just different is all.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for aging skin!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tinted moisturizer! Perfect for summer. It has a nice bronze but natural tint. I'm 61, and it looks great on my skin. Doesn't accentuate my fine lines and wrinkles. Quite the opposite! And it has a nice glow to make your skin look years younger!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the product, blends well into skin. What I disliked was the small amount of product in the tube. There seems to be alot of air in tube and not much product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent coverage but way too greasy and shiny
customer_reviews.text: Decent coverage of dark spots, easy to blend. Way too heavy and greasy for me though. It made my whole face so shiny that people kept thinking I was all sweaty. I switched to a different brand, which works MUCH better.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy M

customer_reviews.title: best foundation out there!
customer_reviews.text: my favorite bare minerals foundation. can be just rubbed in like a lotion with fingers for light coverage. i usually use a foundation brush to apply it and it covers so well, my skin has drastically improved using this every day and it blends so nicely. i truly love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Smith

customer_reviews.title: Find the right shade
customer_reviews.text: Wish they had a color chart to go by I just took a guess on which one might match me
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Onusseit

customer_reviews.title: I agree with some of the feedbacks I read here
customer_reviews.text: After using this for a full month, it caused my breakouts! I am being truthful. This was the only regimen I changed, and I can attest that this product, though really great when applied to my skin, caused A LOT of tiny bumps on my face.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Light weight with great coverage
customer_reviews.text: I will never use another foundation. I love that this is so light. I feel like it even outs my skin tone, without making it super thick. I will never use a different foundation. In love.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Nice for running quick errands ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice coverage. No bad scent. Moisturizing. Pretty lightweight. Won’t last all day but it’s good for running quick errands if you don’t want to put full on makeup. Will guy again.
customer_reviews.author: Wiktoria Bochenska

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Through many years of trying different foundation, this works best for me. Not oily and blends in great. Have bought this for several years now. For me works great!
customer_reviews.author: Helen A. Stein

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product for my skin typr
customer_reviews.text: I dont know that this is really a bad product. My skin reacted poorly to it and I had to gift it. The coverage was good, it was light weight, but after one day of wearing it my skin started breaking out. I have very sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Light and non-oily
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my older skin! Goes on light and doesn't highlight my wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M.

customer_reviews.title: good... not matte...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great base... i wish it wasn't so dewy. I put it on first, then apply my makeup... and my makeup looks a bit "wet" . Next time I'll purchase a more matte lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of this product. It is very light and provides a good balanced coverage without the appearance or feel of wearing foundation. I used a darker shade with my summer tan and still found a nice color match. This has become part of my daily routine and I plan to keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J

customer_reviews.title: Bare minerals favorite product
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this at the store and was hooked on it. This is so light weight and it doesn't dry your skin at all. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: bbizal

customer_reviews.title: No harsh chemicals; blends well
customer_reviews.text: The "natural" color blends well with the color of my skin most all year. It looks natural, not like you have a lot of foundation on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Anne F.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It evens out my skin feels really soft on the skin it has a little bit of coverage but doesn't feel or look like I have anything on. Would definitely recommend this product, only downside is the bottle is a little bit smaller than I had originally thought. But still well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I use this with Ultra Primer and the product lasts all day. I also have sensitive skin and I have seen cleaner and smoother looking skin since switching to use this complexion product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary.p

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and the way that it covers. I don’t know about the sunscreen and the moisture affects that it’s the right color in it I’ve used it before so I love it
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Stimac

customer_reviews.title: ☄️10 stars☄️
customer_reviews.text: Cannot go wrong with anything BareMinerals. Not a bad word to say. I've been using their products for years and I will never trust my skin to any other product. I have combination skin. This particular item is amazing and can be used under the mineral veil, over concealer, or simply worn alone. It's so light you'd never know you had anything on your face at all. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Adriane G

customer_reviews.title: Really love this product
customer_reviews.text: Really love this product, great for people with dry skin! Goes on easy, and doesn't show creases. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Barminerals tinted complexion rescue
customer_reviews.text: This is very convenient and love the look of this. I use this as a primer, foundation and sunscreen. Will be perfect for those hot summer days. Makes my skin look brighter, even, healthy and glowing.
customer_reviews.author: charlene a.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tinted lotion
customer_reviews.text: Great tinted lotion - I've been trying a lot of them and they all made me look orange - this one is perfect I'd recommend mixing with a moisturizer if your skin is very dry like mine and it makes a perfect texture
customer_reviews.author: cecile pimont

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and Silky
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky when it comes to foundations as I hate the caked on look as well as those that pool into wrinkles...this one is a winner, goes on light and smooth with a slight shine that gives it a natural silky look.
customer_reviews.author: Hellon Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I live bare minerals; they make great products and this is one of them. It’s not an overly expensive line!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Very light
customer_reviews.text: This is a very light form of makeup. Just enough to even out your skin a bit. For people that don't like to wear foundation like me. You will love this! It is easy to apply with your fingers. I will be buying this again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Ritterbach

customer_reviews.title: GLOWING SKIN
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this product over and over again. One of the best things about it is that it gives you a dewy and glowy look to your skin. I have a couple old dark acne dots on my face and this masks it very well. I usually don’t have to put on any foundation after.
customer_reviews.author: Air Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Finally found my perfect match!
customer_reviews.text: It's so hard to find a suitable makeup for all your needs. This one is perfect for me. I tried another shade before ordering this one and it was too light. Decided to see how the Natural 05 would look and so glad I did...Happy Lady!
customer_reviews.author: Betty  J.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight coverage
customer_reviews.text: Have used this a long time Good for my skin and lightweight Doesn’t fold into facial creases at all
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Hubby hates foundation but this is the best of both worlds- awesome sunscreen with a hint of coverage. It does make the skin a little too "radiant" though, so I use it lightly and follow up with a little powder on the t-zone.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Grover

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice, bonus has a bit more coverage than most tinted moisturizers. Feel nice n light
customer_reviews.author: bootsie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Light weight foundation
customer_reviews.text: I have used since product came out. I really enjoy in summertime. Light weight and great moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Menerva

customer_reviews.title: Buy. This. Now.
customer_reviews.text: Get this. Stop looking. I have super dry skin esp in winter & makeup usually looks patchy w dry skin. Not this. This allows your skin to breathe and look even. It's also super hydrating and to take a bit of the shine down from the tzone I apply a tiny bit of setting powder. Get this. Little goes a long way too!!
customer_reviews.author: SAMANTHA

customer_reviews.title: wanted something like a tinted moi
customer_reviews.text: wanted something like a tinted moisturizer, like they used to have on the market.... Oil of Olay, tinted moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Good facial covering
customer_reviews.text: I use this mainly for the sun protection. I can't really tell if it moisturizes but it's not drying.
customer_reviews.author: K. Harter

customer_reviews.title: This foundation is wonderful! My skin has never looked so good
customer_reviews.text: This foundation is wonderful! My skin has never looked so good. Have gotten a lot of compliments on my skin now. Not bad for a old lady. : )
customer_reviews.author: Debbie from Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Good foundation
customer_reviews.text: Lasts all day and doesn't look like its melting off my face at the end of the day like the other foundations I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ely

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! It’s light and still does a good job of evening out my skin. I am pretty natural when it comes to makeup and this is perfect to throw on and not look like I have a bunch of make up on.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Been using it for two years now or more and it just works so well for me. It’s not heavy or oily. I put on a powder after I put this on. It says on all day for me I feel. It’s not a heavy coverage. It’s like but it gives me the tint my skin needs.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: I’m on day 1, but the second I put it on you can see a difference. I am using this as a concealer. It is light and natural looking. This will be a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Sisterwalker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for light coverage with no settling in fine lines
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Exactly what I was looking for! I tried two Neutrogena tinted moisturizers... too thick or too orange. I’m 54 and Bare Minerals natural 05 is perfect for my beige to medium skin tone!
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed. This product caused my skin to break out in small blisters. I thought it was just my skin so I gave it to my friend. She had the same thing happen. Almost like the formula was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: My favorite tinted moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect coverage and light weight and doesn’t smell. Defiantly 30spf haven’t had any problems being in the sun or tanning. On my second tube and I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: kelli E

customer_reviews.title: I like it because I can control my look with a ...
customer_reviews.text: This makes the second time I have placed an order for this item. I like it because I can control my look with a light amount for everyday. Or a bit more for those times when it calls for more. Or use a bit more for a more intence look
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: This is the first tinted moisturizer I’ve tried and I have to say my skin is pretty oily to begin with, but this actually helps moisturize and prevent so much oiliness. I really like it if I’m not in the mood for foundation or a full face of make up.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Q

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and glides on.
customer_reviews.text: The product glides on and provides great coverage. I'll continue to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Mix

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and light coverage which is good for the summer and the heat!! I really enjoy this!!
customer_reviews.author: Amalan

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. Doesn't feel heavy on face. Has a perfect amount of tent.
customer_reviews.author: Toy

customer_reviews.title: No fragrance finally!
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this project is there is no fragrance there is a light coverage and it's a good foundation base. Give it a try
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: Don’t you want to look younger?
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I have been buying for years at a higher price at Ultra. Goes on smooth and covers imperfections.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight with light coverage, which is what I like. You will never feel Cakey with this product
customer_reviews.author: Moeazy

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight feel!
customer_reviews.text: It feels great on skin, lightweight just as advertised. I wanted something that would look natural and this product does that. Most of the time I wear only the foundation so it should be good enough to give coverage but also look like plain naked skin and this does that!! Enjoying the product no complaints!!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: It is the best foundation!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best foundation I have ever used! No more hunting!
customer_reviews.author: BLACK HILLS ANNIE

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing and light
customer_reviews.text: Love this gel! Feels so moisturizing and light. My new favorite!
customer_reviews.author: D. Higgins

product_meta.title: bareMinerals Complexion Rescue Tinted Hydrating Gel Cream SPF 30, Natural 05, 1.18 Ounce
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Natural 05Why you’ll love it: 

Powerful hydration: Marine botanicals and coconut-derived ingredients help to replenish, nourish and condition thirsty skin
Skin replenishing: Energizing mineral electrolytes, calcium and magnesium, help replenish the skin while potassium helps promote skin’s moisture balance
Refreshing feeling: Unique water-encapsulations give skin an instant burst of hydration upon application with a light, cooling sensation
Protects with broad spectrum SPF 30 non-chemical, mineral-based sunscreen
Recommended by The Skin Cancer Foundation as effective broad-spectrum sunscreen
Buildable, sheer-to-medium coverage
Non-comedogenic
Non-acnegenic
Hypoallergenic
Dermatologist-tested
Formulated without parabens, binders or fillers
None of our products are tested on animals 

Clean Formula 

Full of clean, hydrating coverage. Free of dryness. 

Formulated WITHOUT: 

Parabens
Phthalates
Fragrance
Chemical sunscreens
Sodium lauryl sulfate
Mineral oil
Triclosan
Formaldehyde
Talc
Gluten
Animal-derived ingredients
feature_bullets: For medium skin with neutral tones
